Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video shows anti-terror police conducting a drill in Germany, not a gun attack at an Amsterdam mall.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by falsely stating that there was a gun attack at an Amsterdam mall.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading video and does not provide any additional evidence.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is depicting a real gun attack without verifying the authenticity of the footage.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the video shows an anti-terrorism exercise in Germany.
